data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Leiria, Portugal, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Leiria, Portugal
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Leiria who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Leiria unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Please, convict the 16,170 believers in Leiria, Portugal to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, help the 16,170 believers in Leiria to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 443,330 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Leiria, Portugal by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Leiria that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
